text: He imanadaragana! Tomara allahara anugatya kara, rasulera anugatya kara, ara'o anugatya kara tomadera madhyakara ksamatasiladera [1], atahpara kono bisaye tomadera madhye matabheda ghatale ta upasthapita kara allaha o rasulera nikata, yadi tomara allaha o akherate imana ene thaka. E panthaya uttama ebam pariname prakrstatara
